title: Foggy city street with moderate traffic and frequent braking
caption: A blue car drives slowly on a foggy city street with moderate traffic and frequent braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (customWeather). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 2.0 m/s). There are 15 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a two-lane city street with a yellow traffic light on the left side. There are several other cars on the road, some of them are parked on the side of the road. The visibility is low due to the fog. The traffic light is red.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the low visibility and the frequent braking events. It is maintaining a safe distance from the other cars on the road and is prepared to stop if necessary. The driver is being cautious and is paying close attention to the traffic light and the other vehicles on the road.
